aboutus.title: bout Us
aboutus.desc: HairCoSys is the first mobile app for hair and scalp check-ups with artificial intelligence. It is the all-in-one platform for hair beauty and cares with fun and engaging functions such as a virtual hair styling function, hair loss prediction, and shopping recommendations based on a scientific diagnosis of the user's hair condition.

mission.title: ission
mission.desc: HairCoSys empowers everyone in different life stages with healthy hair by democratizing hair and scalp check-ups through big data analytics and artificial intelligence, easy-to-use mobile apps, and public education on the concept of hair loss prevention.

strength.title: trength
strength.carddesc1: of hair and scalp identified by our proprietary algorithms
strength.carddesc2: of hair and scalp labelled by hair professionals for machine learning
strength.carddesc3: of hair care experience of HairAgain to support our professional diagnosis

product.desc2: technology provided by us, the hair care and hairstyling industry are propelled into the digital age

newscard.title: HairCoSys showcases AI innovation at 2022 Hong Kong ICT Expo
newscard.shortdesc: HairCoSys is showcasing our AI innovations to solve hair loss problems at the 2022 Hong Kong ICT Expo.
newscard.longdesc: HairCoSys is showcasing our AI innovations to solve hair loss problems at the 2022 Hong Kong ICT Expo. Since joining the HKSTP Incubation programme, we have been using valuable data captured in the last 20+ years from their experienced partners and leverage haircare domain knowledge to build diagnostic models now and predictive models in the near future for hair loss. Besides meeting many old and new friends, we are glad that our demonstration on the A.I. scalp diagnostic has become one of the visitors’ favourite things to do at the ICT Expo!

newscard.title: Summer Internship Program
newscard.shortdesc: As our 2022 summer internship program comes to an end, we’re sending a big thank you to all of our interns with a lunch party.
newscard.longdesc: As our 2022 summer internship program comes to an end, we’re sending a big thank you to all of our interns with a lunch party. Our smart and dynamic tech team has been helping them develop knowledge and skills in A.I., machine learning, mobile app development and big data analysis. We thank everyone for being a part of the HairCoSys family this summer and it was a pleasure having you all. Are you or someone you know interested in joining the adventure of A.I. and tech development with HairCoSys? Please get in touch with us!

newscard.title: HairCoSys enters Hong Kong Science and Technology Park!
newscard.shortdesc: We are pleased to announce the opening of HairCoSys Limited @HKSTP - Hong Kong Science and Technology Parks Corporation!
newscard.longdesc: We are pleased to announce the opening of HairCoSys Limited @HKSTP - Hong Kong Science and Technology Parks Corporation! HairCoSys is dedicated to building an ecosystem for the hair care and hair beauty industry with the use of A.I. and Big Data. During the opening ceremony, Michael Wong the founder & CEO shared his vision to solve hair loss problems through A.I.-haircare expert collaboration. Please stay tuned for regular updates on our A.I. research and technology development! #artificialintelligence #scienceandtechnology

hero.title: Jump Start Your Career in Artificial Intelligence with HairCoSys

card.title: "Small Team, Big Impact"
card.desc: You will be an invaluable member of our flexible and agile team. You won’t be put in a box and be exposed to a wide range of new technology as our business grows.

card.title: Disrupting the industry
card.desc: You will work on our innovative projects to reform the haircare/beauty-related industry and propel them to the digital era with artificial intelligence.

card.title: Fast-paced career development
card.desc: You will start your fulfilling and fascinating career in the innovation and technology sector, becoming a pro, and turn your ideas into reality.

card.title: Have Fun!
card.desc: You are joining a young and energetic team with respectful and fun company culture, and with free snacks!
